name: FtpUpload
author: Microsoft Corporation
helpMarkDown: Upload files to an FTP server using either FTP, or secure FTPS

inputs.name: serverEndpoint
inputs.label: FTP Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the service endpoint for your FTP server.  To create one, click the Manage link and create a new Generic Service Endpoint, enter the FTP server URL for the server URL, e.g. ftps://server.example.com, and required credentials.

inputs.name: filePatterns
inputs.label: File patterns
inputs.helpMarkDown: File paths or patterns of the files to upload.  Supports multiple lines of minimatch patterns.  [More Information](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=800269)

inputs.name: clean
inputs.label: Clean Remote Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Delete the remote directory location before uploading

inputs.name: overwrite
inputs.label: Overwrite
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overwrite existing files in the remote location

inputs.name: flatten
inputs.label: Flatten Paths
inputs.helpMarkDown: Flatten the paths at the remote location
